1. Mean Density of Adults
```{r}

#read in adult data
all_org <- read_csv("adult_other.csv")

#filter for only the adult fish
adults_clean <- all_org %>%
  clean_names( case = "snake") %>%
  filter(grepl('Adult', organism)) %>%
  gather(place, amount, rarotonga_2009:ci, factor_key = T)

#histograms
ggplot(adults_clean, aes(x = amount, fill = organism)) +
  geom_histogram()




```
